name: INFRA: Evil Unearthed DEMO
description:
INFRA: Evil Unearthed is a retro inspired FPS where you hunt for treasure in cryptic, monster infested landscapes. Blast cultists, dodge goblins and maneuver through tricks and traps.

This game supports both keyboard/mouse and controller. The game has only been tested with a PS controller, so although Xbox should also work, I don't know for sure.
